events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but unfortunately the screen has multiple scratches and some dead pixels that affect the display quality.
The reported issue involves a defective product, specifically screen damage including scratches and dead pixels.
Your case has been assigned to our technical support specialist who will assist you with the damaged laptop screen.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the screen issues you’re experiencing. I’m here to help get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and dead pixels so we can better assess the damage and find a solution?
Here are the pictures showing the scratched areas on the screen and the dead pixels clearly visible in the top right corner.
Thank you for the photos. We will offer a replacement screen for your laptop or, if you prefer, a full replacement unit at no extra cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer for a replacement screen. I would prefer to get the full unit replaced if that’s possible.
We have arranged for a full replacement laptop to be shipped to you immediately. A return label for the defective unit will be emailed shortly.
We just wanted to check in and ensure that your replacement laptop has arrived and is working properly without any issues.
The replacement arrived today and the screen is flawless. Thank you very much for your help and fast service!
Closing this case as resolved since the customer confirmed receipt and satisfaction with the replacement laptop.
A survey invitation has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their support experience and satisfaction with the resolution.
